titleStmt.title: A true account of the proceedings at the assizes, held for the county of Surrey at Croydon, begun on Wednesday the 28th. of February, 1683. and there continued for several days With a relation of the prisoners tryed and condemned at the said assizes.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Croom, in Thames-Street over against Baynard's Castle,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
